page.title: 15Ulcombe church
page.content: Ulcombe church is in the middle of a hill. Of course it has a grave yard and the oldest grave you can see has the date{1310 }and is next to the church entrance and the newest is{1984 but is up a track a bit because there is no more room left.In the grave yard there are lots of yew trees.One of them is{9m}and another is{11m}in circumference.These trees were mentioned in the old Domesday book and one tree is{3000}years old.The grave yard was an{ancient burial ground } before it was a christian one. There are two tombs in the church and lots of graves on the church floor.The church has{11 windows It has got{6 bells}and they have bellringing practise on Thursday for 1 and a half hours.The bells were cast in{1601}and have never been recasted since.
